sources.title: 1951 - The Man With My Face - El hombre con mi cara - Edward Montagne
sources.description: 1951 - The Man With My Face - El hombre con mi cara - Edward Montagne

sources.title: The Man With My Face (1951) Barry Nelson, Carole Mathews, Lynn Ainley
sources.description: The Man with My Face is a 1951 American FILM NOlR directed by Edward Montagne featuring Barry Nelson, Carole Mathews and Lynn Ainley.    Though the original novel is set in California, the movie takes place in Puerto Rico. It is the only FILM NOlR shot on location in that country.   You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and read an article from FILM NOlR of the Week .

metadata.Plot: A man arrives home one night to find that a look- alike has taken over his life completely.
metadata.Writer: Vin Bogert, Tom McGowan, Edward Montagne
metadata.Actors: Barry Nelson, Carole Mathews, Lynn Ainley
